title: Episode #74: An Overview of U.S.-China Relations
itunes:title: Episode #74: An Overview of U.S.-China Relations
itunes:subtitle: Michael O'Hanlon and Jim Steinberg discuss their new book,  at a Brookings event moderated by Michael Green.
description:
Michael O'Hanlon and Jim Steinberg discuss their new book, Strategic Reassurance and Resolve: U.S.-China Relations in the Twenty-First Century at a Brookings event moderated by Michael Green.

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/lawfare.
